questions.text: If three farmers can plant three trees in three hours, how long would it take nine farmers to plant nine trees?

answers.confidence_justification: Valutazione breve, non dice molto a livello tecnico, facile da giudicare
Facile da giudicare in quanto fornisce poche informazioni, si lamenta solo di un problema del quale non si lamenta neanche a causa del prezzo contenuto del prodotto
Frasi brevi e concise, facili da comprendere e grazie alle quali è facile giudicare la recensione
Non essendo a conoscenza dell'oggetto recensito ho meno fiducia sul mio giudizio in quanto non so quante informazioni mi ha dato e quanto possano essere rilevanti
Review seria, completa ed analizza il prdotto descrivendone pro e contro, facile da giudicare data la sua completezza

documents.text: I've tried every tooth whitening strip out there, I think. Anyone who was given tetracycline as a child can relate to the yellow teeth! These whiten the best and are easy to use. You can get them anywhere, but this seller has great prices and ships quickly, no need to leave the house!
documents.product_title: Crest 3D Whitestrips Professional Tooth Whitening Kit - Sensitive - 28 Treatments 56 Strips

documents.text:
It works.  My old one quit.  For the price, you can't say much more.

It makes an ANNOYING high pitched whine that my original Braun ($80?) did not make.  I'm not yet sure the whine is worth the savings.

Great machine. The is the second unit as we have had one in our tasting room for a couple of years and now have added this to our home.
Unit cleans a 2000 square foot area daily and is very effective. Pet hair is not and issue

This is a study tool and will hold what ever your working with a simple turn of the wheel. I use it on the end of my drill to spin and mix my E-Iuices
in 30 ml bottles and it holds them firmly in place with no worries of losing it's grip...
documents.product_title: 214F2 Karter Scientific Extension Lab Clamp 3 Prong Single Adjust 10-90mm Jaw

documents.text:
This is a fantastic product for it's price. I've found it to be very accurate, probably not for any highly precise scientific applications, but for mechanical work and other general use it's great. The build quality is one of my favorite parts, it has a nice smooth rubberized grip that's soft to the touch and the yellow plastic doesn't feel cheap. The back-light is bright and makes it extremely convenient, and lastly the sheer number of options and modes the thermometer has is incredibly useful (it even has a low-battery indicator).

Overall I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good quality, budget, general-use laser thermometer.

Pros:
- Accurate for everyday use
- Great build quality
- Lots of functions/modes/features
- Good price
- Nice packaging and clear instructions booklet
- Free 9V battery included

Cons:
- Probably not accurate enough for any kind of professional work requiring highly precise measurements.
- Lasers are not adjustable, they intersect at about 6 inches from the gun and this cannot be changed, however I'm not a professional user of this kind of thermometer so I'm not sure if that would even be a useful feature to have.
documents.product_title: AVANTEK Dual Laser Infrared Thermometer -58 ºF - 1562 ºF (-50 ºC - 850 ºC), Non-Contact Digital IR Temperature Gun, Adjustable Emissivity, MAX/MIN/DIF/AVG Modes with Temperature Alarm

dimensions.name: reliability
dimensions.description:
the review is considered reliable, as opposed to reporting
unreliable information

dimensions.name: neutrality
dimensions.description:
the review is expressed in objective terms, as opposed to
resulting subjective or biased

dimensions.name: comprehensibility
dimensions.description:
the review is understandable/readable as
opposed to difficult to understand

dimensions.name: precision
dimensions.description: the review is precise/specific, as opposed to vague.

dimensions.name: completeness
dimensions.description: the review is complete as opposed to partial

dimensions.name: informativeness
dimensions.description:
the review allows deriving useful information as
opposed to well-known facts and/or tautologies

dimensions.name: confidence
dimensions.description: How confidence are you about your previous answers?
